pitchLab.pianoWindow
Class GToolTip

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          java.awt.Window
              javax.swing.JWindow
                  pitchLab.pianoWindow.GToolTip
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer
public class GToolTip
extends javax.swing.JWindow

Generates the tiny window that shows the current note the bar is on while dragging the bar across the piano window.

Version:
0.6 April 7, 2009
Author:
Gavin Shriver
See Also:
Serialized Form
